updates.update-prompt: Would you like to install the update now?
updates.title:
Software Update Available
Squidstat User Interface v2.11.19.2020

windows64.changelog:
1. Improvements made to the View Data tab to facilitate larger data sets with multiple channels
2. Channel Status Tab revamped into a Multichannel Control Tab.
3. Multi device RRDE added to Prebuilt experiments.
4. Battery Capacity added to Prebuilt and Custom experiments
A full list of changes is available in the More Options tab within the Squidstat User Interface.
